item.title: OpenAI、谷歌和 Anthropic 正在努力打造更先进的人工智能
item.description:
三家领先的人工智能公司在耗费巨资开发新模型的过程中看到的回报越来越少。【原文：

Three of the leading artificial intelligence companies are seeing diminishing returns from their costly efforts to develop newer models.

】

item.title: 阿布扎比 1 万亿美元基金调整战略，加快交易速度
item.description: 阿布扎比 1 万亿美元的财富基金正在采用更科学的投资方法，更多地依靠自己的量化团队来加快决策速度，以提高收益。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s $1 trillion wealth fund is embracing a more scientific approach to investing, leaning more on its own quant team to speed up decision-making as it seeks to bolster returns.】

item.title: 赞比亚将关键利率上调至 14%，以降低物价，支撑克瓦查汇率
item.description: 赞比亚央行将关键利率上调至2017年以来的最高水平，以遏制物价压力并支撑其伤痕累累的货币。【原文：Zambia’s central bank raised its key interest rate to the highest level since 2017 to contain price pressures and prop up its bruised currency.】

item.title: 哦，讽刺特朗普的胜利与未来四年
item.description:
民主党人认为这次选举事关身体自主权。对许多选民来说，这更多的是关于鸡蛋的价格。【原文：

Democrats thought the election was about bodily autonomy. For many voters, it was more about the price of eggs.

】

item.title: CVC支持的FineToday将于12月在东京黄金市场上市
item.description: 日本个人护理用品企业 FineToday Holdings Co. 将于 12 月在东京证券交易所主板市场上市，根据指示价格，预计市值为 2,194 亿日元（14 亿美元）。【原文：Japanese personal-care business FineToday Holdings Co. will debut on the Tokyo Stock Exchange’s Prime Market in December, with an estimated market value of ¥219.4 billion ($1.4 billion) based on the indicative price.】

item.title: 暑期游戏大卖，腾讯收入增长 8
item.description: 在《地下城与勇士》（Dungeon & Fighter Mobile）于夏季上映后，腾讯控股有限公司的收入增长了 8%，帮助这家中国最有价值的公司抵御了严重的经济衰退。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s revenue rose 8% after the summer release of Dungeon & Fighter Mobile helped China’s most valuable company resist a severe economic downturn.】

item.title: 比马斯克收购 X 还要大的七项收购案；i 的提议将跻身顶级收购交易之列
item.description: Seven & i 控股公司管理层提出的私有化要约价值约 9 万亿日元（580 亿美元），超过了私募股权或管理层参与的最大收购案的价值。【原文：An offer worth around ¥9 trillion ($58 billion) from the management of Seven & i Holdings Co. to take itself private exceeds the value of the biggest buyouts involving private equity or the management.】

item.title: 马来西亚航空公司总裁伊扎姆续约后将继续留任
item.description: 马来西亚航空公司（Malaysia Airlines）周三证实，该公司首席执行官伊扎姆-伊斯梅尔（Izham Ismail）在续约后将继续执掌公司一年。【原文：Malaysia Airlines Chief Executive Officer Izham Ismail will stay at the helm another year after his contract was extended, the carrier confirmed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据说 Bumi Armada 正在考虑收购 MISC 近海能源资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚大亨 T. Ananda Krishnan 控制的油田服务提供商 Bumi Armada Bhd 正在考虑收购 MISC Bhd 的海上能源业务。【原文：Bumi Armada Bhd., an oil field services provider controlled by Malaysian tycoon T. Ananda Krishnan, is considering buying MISC Bhd.’s offshore energy business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 冲突持续，黎巴嫩动用美元储备支撑受创货币
item.description: 黎巴嫩的外汇储备在一年多的时间里首次下降，因为央行在几周的战争后花费美元支撑英镑。【原文：Lebanon’s foreign-exchange reserves dropped for the first time in more than a year as the central bank spent dollars to prop up the pound after weeks of war.】

item.title: 希腊总理称特朗普获胜后欧洲需要更强的自治能力
item.description: 希腊总理基里亚科斯-米佐塔基斯（Kyriakos Mitsotakis）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普连任后，欧洲需要加强自主性并提高竞争力。【原文：Europe needs to strengthen its autonomy and improve its competitiveness following the reelection of Donald Trump, Greece’s Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said.】

item.title: 五年清洁支出计划已过半，上交所总裁将退休
item.description: 上交所（SSE Plc）首席执行官阿利斯泰尔-菲利普斯-戴维斯（Alistair Phillips-Davies）将于明年退休，因为该公司为期五年、总值 205 亿英镑（约合 261 亿美元）的绿色投资计划已经过半。【原文：SSE Plc’s chief executive officer Alistair Phillips-Davies is set to retire next year as the company reaches the halfway point in its five-year £20.5 billion ($26.1 billion) green investment plan.】

item.title: Lumus 交易推动澳大利亚收购融资活动
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Affinity Equity Partners 公司已经为收购澳大利亚医疗诊断公司 Healius Ltd 的一个成像部门安排了一笔杠杆贷款，从而推动了澳大利亚的收购融资活动。【原文：Affinity Equity Partners has lined up a leveraged loan to finance its takeover of a imaging unit from Australian medical diagnostic company Healius Ltd, according to people familiar with the matter, in a boost to Australia’s buyout financing activity.】

item.title: 关西电力将通过出售股份筹集高达 33 亿美元的资金
item.description: 根据向日本财政部提交的一份文件，日本地区公用事业公司关西电力公司计划通过出售股票筹集高达 5049 亿日元（33 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Japanese regional utility Kansai Electric Power Co. plans to raise as much as 504.9 billion yen ($3.3 billion) from a share sale, according to a filing to Japan’s finance ministry.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司拯救计划获得主要债权人支持
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司赢得了债权人的关键支持，得以继续推进其筹集 30 亿英镑（38 亿美元）紧急资金的计划。【原文：Thames Water won crucial support from creditors to move forward with its plan to raise £3 billion ($3.8 billion) in emergency funding.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑进一步下挫至八月以来最低水平
泰拉科利用 Absa 为人工智能准备设施提供的 4.42 亿美元贷款
item.description: Teraco Data Environments Ltd.聘请Absa Group Ltd.组成银团，提供80亿兰特（约合4.42亿美元）的贷款，因为该公司正在筹建新设施，以满足人工智能应用不断增长的需求。【原文：Teraco Data Environments Ltd. hired Absa Group Ltd. to syndicate an 8 billion rand ($442 million) loan as the company gears up for a new facility to meet rising demand from artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金再次削减任天堂股份
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金进一步减持任天堂公司股票，加深了 8 月份开始的抛售。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund further trimmed its stake in Nintendo Co., deepening a selloff that began in August.】

item.title: 美国创业公司以 6.5 亿美元收购 Just Eat 外卖公司旗下的 Grubhub
item.description: Wonder Group Inc. 将以约 6.5 亿美元的价格从 Just Eat Takeaway.com NV 手中收购 Grubhub，与 Covid 大流行初期 73 亿美元的标价相比，收购这家餐厅外卖服务公司的价格大打折扣。【原文：Wonder Group Inc. is buying Grubhub from Just Eat Takeaway.com NV for about $650 million, acquiring the restaurant delivery service at a steep discount to the $7.3 billion price tag it commanded during the early days of the Covid pandemic.】

item.title: 安联集团本季度业绩强劲，利润达到预期最高水平
item.description: 安联集团（Allianz SE）是太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Allianz SE, the German insurer that owns Pacific Investment Management Co., slightly lifted its guidance for full-year profit after third-quarter profit rose, driven by its property-casualty insurance business.】

item.title: 日元兑美元汇率降至 155，干预风险上升
item.description: 日元汇率自 7 月以来首次跌破 1 美元兑 155 日元，这增加了日本将进入货币市场试图减缓贬值的风险。【原文：The yen weakened beyond 155 per dollar for the first time since July, raising the risk that Japan will enter the currency market to try to slow the depreciation.】

item.title: 瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 申请在美国上市，广受期待
item.description: 瑞典支付公司 Klarna Group Plc 已在美国提交首次公开募股申请，结束了数月来有关该公司准备在股票市场上市的猜测。【原文：Swedish payments firm Klarna Group Plc has filed for an initial public offering in the US, ending months of speculation that the company was readying a stock market listing.】

item.title: 获得 20 倍回报的土耳其风险投资公司募集 2.5 亿美元基金，更名为 Bek Ventures
item.description: 一家在东欧和土耳其颇受欢迎的风险投资公司已更名为 Bek Ventures，并募集了 2.5 亿美元的基金，用于在该地区的投资。【原文：A venture capital firm with notable hits in eastern Europe and Turkey has rebranded as Bek Ventures and raised a $250 million fund to invest in the region.】

item.title: 乐天以超过 10 亿美元的价格出售瑞穗 15%的信用卡业务
item.description: 乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.）【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. said it’s selling about 15% of its credit card arm to Mizuho Financial Group Inc. for ¥165 billion ($1.1 billion).】

item.title: 特朗普政策引发担忧，韩国股市创一年新低
item.description: 由于外国投资者抛售三星电子公司等易受唐纳德-特朗普贸易保护主义政策影响的主要出口商，韩国股市跌至一年来的最低点。【原文：South Korean shares were headed for their lowest in a year, as foreign investors sold major exporters including Samsung Electronics Co. that are vulnerable to Donald Trump’s protectionist trade policy.】

item.title: 再次出现的黑暗舰队船只凸显僵尸船的挑战性
item.description: 去年 5 月，一艘黑暗舰队的船只在马来西亚海岸附近爆炸，其烧焦的残骸被送往印度尼西亚的一个废料场。上个月，它的转发器信号再次恢复正常。【原文：After a dark-fleet ship exploded off the coast of Malaysia in May last year, its scorched wreck was sent to an Indonesian scrapyard. Then, last month, its transponder signal went live once again.】

item.title: 官员称菲律宾未被纳入摩根大通债券指数
item.description: 菲律宾官员表示，菲律宾已将目光锁定在 2025 年纳入摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The Philippines has set it sights on inclusion into JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s local-currency emerging-market debt index in 2025 after missing the cut this year, officials said.】

item.description: 周三将标志着把印度变成世界最大期权市场的合约的结束。【原文：Wednesday will mark the end of the contract that turned India into the world’s largest options market.】

item.title: 国债收益率将为日元投资者带来利好
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选推高美国利率，以及美联储降息降低了对冲成本，日元对冲国债收益率两年来首次转为正值。【原文：Yen-hedged Treasury yields are set to turn positive for the first time in two years as Donald Trump’s election victory pushes up US rates and the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cuts lower hedging costs.】
